blog.name: uwillneverknowwho
blog.title: I love Dan Howell and i'm so fucking proud
blog.description: I rarely change anything and this is not a Daniel Howell stan account. I just want everyone who sees my blog to know that all of this truly does mean a lot. As a fellow queer, a fan and simply a human being. Thank you so much, Dan. (If you don't know what i'm talking about - go watch Daniel Howell's latest video, even if you haven't the foggiest who he is). Now onto my original bio. She/her. Idk anymore, i just know i like girls. I scream about fandoms a lot. Like, A LOT. I LOVE MY FANDOMS SO MUCH. This is my personal blog, but i have no life so 99,9% of it is just fandom stuff. Gryffinpuff, i guessssss... Feel free to compliment my icon, i spent tough 5 minutes on it. ALSO IT'S A PUN MY NAME IS A PUN AND MY ICON IS A VISUAL FOR THE PUN SOMEONE PLEASE GET IT (!!! yessss someone did akskkaka)

tags: i personally only ship them platonically but i'm not sure who else would fit here
body:
5 + 1 bus AU

Person A goes home by the same bus every day. They’re not in a good place in life right now and they just constantly feel down, exhausted after a long day of work/school/whatever. Person B goes by the same bus every day. After some time B notices A(a sad person sitting alone at the end of the bus) and starts smiling at them to somehow make them feel better? And it works. Person B smiles at A and A smiles back and it’s the highlight of A’s day. Until one day B isn’t smiling. B sits down alone at the end of the bus and tries to smile at A, but just,,, can’t. So A sits next to B and wordlessly hugs them. B starts crying and tells A what’s wrong. This is the first time they talk.

Or, 5 times B helped A and 1 time A helped B.

(Please, if you write anything inspired by this, link it in the notes)

summary: You guys probs aren’t reading this but the small chance that you are, I just want to say thank you for so much. You’ve helped me...
body: You guys probs aren’t reading this but the small chance that you are, I just want to say thank you for so much. You’ve helped me and my frens get through some really dark times and there is nothing better than watching your videos and laughing for once. My friend Josh loved your videos and you guys made his death easier to accept. Thank you so much for stopping/distracting many of my friends from doing irrational things that hurt them. You’ve even stopped me from hurting myself a few times. I want you to know that you guys are so loved and appreciated, and that your fans will always be there to help and support you through anything you may be going through now, or may have to go through in the future. Y’all get so many people including me and my friends through the darkest of times and should always know that the phandom will help you through anything too. We love you so much. Keep being the amazing people you are. Phil you are a ray of sunshine. Dan, you’re a ghost hug (not there, but you can feel you caring). Thanks for everything. Love y’all so much. 💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛. Thank you.

summary:
dan won’t come back earlier if y’all keep being salty about him not uploading. 
he needs a break.
let him take a break. 
please....
body:
dan won’t come back earlier if y’all keep being salty about him not uploading.

he needs a break.

let him take a break.

please.

i know we all miss him, but if we give him the time and support him, i’m sure he’ll come back better than ever.

blog.name: pmlxdjh
blog.title: ☞ № ☜
blog.description:
lauren | 16 | phillie | ii 17/05/18

dan and phil taking over my life since 2013

body:
update

yall probs noticed i haven’t been online (or not bc i’m literally just another spam account) but i have had a couple of asks as to where my shit posts and argument starters have been.

basically, i’m sick of this fandom. i love dan and phil and everything they do and i always will, but the people here make me want to rip my hands off.

everyone is so literal, acting like it’s 2013 and pretending to be the guys themselves. every time i see a post i cringe. and i’m getting sick of that.


i’ll be back when yall have grown up.
